entry.title: RT FischerKing: The economics of mass immigration are straightforward. Wealthy individuals and corporations get cheap labor and more customers. Social...
entry.summary: RTâ€‚FischerKing The economics of mass immigration are straightforward. Wealthy individuals and corporations get cheap labor and more customers. Social costs - more expensive housing, crime, bad schools, lower wages - are paid by middle/working class. The wealthy/corps never feel the downside.

entry.summary: Re The biggest upgrade is our token pages, which have been optimized for actionability. You can now easily observe 24hr inflows, current holders, contract security, high realized PnL smart wallets, smart holdings over time and much more.

entry.title: Re The new and improved alpha stream now gives you unmatched context around live smart money swaps. Each trader is tagged with their average holding t...
entry.summary: Re The new and improved alpha stream now gives you unmatched context around live smart money swaps. Each trader is tagged with their average holding time, win rate, and relative PnL within the smart money cohort
